actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to be cited as the "North Eastern Rail Service Preservation Act of 1973"
short_title: North Eastern Rail Service Preservation Act

summary.text: North Eastern Rail Service Preservation Act - Directs the Secretary of Transportation to compile an inventory of the rail transportation facilities of specified railway companies. Authorizes the Secretary to acquire by condemnation all assets of such railroads no later than three months after such inventory. Provides for the transfer of the rail lines owned or operated by railroad companies undergoing reorganization in bankruptcy proceedings, and a majority of whose rail lines are located in the northeast region. Authorizes necessary appropriations to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: North Eastern Rail Service Preservation Act
A bill to be cited as the "North Eastern Rail Service Preservation Act of 1973"
